module.name: alipayx
module.description: ALIPAY IS THE WORLDS LEADING E-PAYMENT PROVIDER WITH 400 MILLION ACTIVE USERS IN CHINA. It processes 50% of the total online transactions and is the most preferred payment method by Chinese consumers. Configure Alipay and start selling to China now.
module.author: ECartX
module.confirmUninstall: Are you sure you want to uninstall AlipayX?
